OOC: I have to re-write my post. SOrry. 

Perceptor/Charon/Deepfear/underground

Perceptor and his team were running inside underground tunnels that 
existed since planet's birth. Soon Perceptor said a signal and they 
separated in diferents ways.

Charon::

"My circuits detect a stasis lock-bot in surface" reported the bot by 
comm link(The bot was Bullet)

Deepfear::

"My circuits reported a bot, I don't know if it is funcional" 
reported Deepfear too by comm link (The bot is Blazer).


Perceptor::

"Use the operation 23" said the blind bot while he continued in 
vehical mode his way "You know what to do with them... prepare your 
stunn gun.."

Deepfear, and charon started to dig several miles under 
the bots that they found, making that the bots that Perceptor's team 
had found (bullet and blaze) fall inside underground 
tunnels.

The others followed Perceptor
